problematic: Most versatile Polish profanity - whore/fuck/shit, used as exclamation, comma in speech, or harsh insult
Vulgar term for male genitalia (dick/cock), used as insult or to describe bad situations
Buttocks/ass - moderate vulgarity, sometimes used affectionately
Shit - moderate profanity, used to describe something worthless or bad
Primary vulgar verb - fuck/screw. Extremely versatile with prefixes changing meaning dramatically
Secondary vulgar verb - fuck. Like pierdolić, takes many prefixes with different meanings
Extremely vulgar female anatomy term (cunt) - highest severity offensive term
Fuck off/get lost - extremely strong dismissive command, reserved for heated arguments
Mild expletive - damn/bloody hell, religiously derived but not highly offensive
Devil - mild religious profanity, used in exclamations
Vulgar term for penis, alternative to chuj
Vulgar female anatomy term, regional variant of pizda but less severe
To shit/defecate - moderate scatological profanity
To piss/urinate - moderate scatological profanity
To fart - mild scatological term, often humorous
Idiot/moron - harsh personal insult derived from jebać
Idiot/moron - ableist slur, moderate severity
Whore/slut - derogatory term for women, sexually charged insult
Rag/slut - derogatory term for women, implies worthlessness
Son of a whore - extremely offensive compound insult combining kurwa + syn
Asshole - moderate insult, diminutive of dupa
To cut/fail - mild slang, used about failing at something
Penis - regional vulgar term, less severe than chuj
Balls/testicles - moderate vulgar slang for male anatomy
Dick/penis - slang term, moderate vulgarity
To fuck - vulgar sexual verb, primary meaning sexual intercourse
Brothel/mess - moderate profanity, used to describe chaos or disorder
Little shit/brat - moderate insult for young person acting badly
Bitch - derogatory term for women, borrowed from animal terminology
Mild exclamation - usually combined with other words, from 'mother'
To fuck up/mess up - prefixed form of pierdolić meaning to ruin something
To get drunk/beat up - prefixed jebać with multiple meanings depending on context
Awesome/fucking great - paradoxically positive despite vulgar origin
Get the fuck out - strong dismissive command, prefixed pierdolić
To piss off/annoy - derived from kurwa, means to anger or irritate
Shitty/fucking bad - adjective derived from chuj meaning very bad quality
Fucker/asshole - strong personal insult derived from jebać
Fucking/damn - intensifying adjective derived from kurwa
Piece of junk - slang for broken or useless object
To hit hard/crash into - violent prefixed form of jebać
Piece of shit person - strong insult combining scatological with personal attack
Penis - regional slang variant, moderate vulgarity
Faggot/weakling - homophobic slur, also used for weak person
Faggot - homophobic slur, highly offensive to LGBTQ+ individuals
Bum/homeless person - derogatory term for vagrant or alcoholic
Moron/idiot - mild insult derived from pierdolić, diminutive form
Shitting/crap - scatological noun, moderate profanity for bad situation
Pissing - scatological noun from szczać, moderate vulgarity
Bullshit/nonsense talk - noun from pierdolić meaning meaningless chatter
To go crazy/be fucked up - prefixed jebać referring to mental state
Shitty situation - noun derived from chuj describing bad circumstances
Fucking/bitchy - feminine form of kurewski, intensifying adjective
Fucking/damn - intensifying adjective from jebać, very strong emphasis
Fucking/damn - intensifying adjective from pierdolić, emphasis and anger
Fucked up/broken - adjective describing damaged or problematic state
Shitload/lots of - prefixed jebać meaning large quantity of something
To shit all over - scatological verb meaning to soil or mess up badly
To piss on - scatological verb meaning to urinate on something
